author: Jorge Garcia
text: 'Great quality food clean

author: Matthew Sheffield
text: 'Some of the best pizza I‚Äôve had in Hoboken! Super fresh ingredients
column5: great flavorful crust with a nice char on the bottom. My new go-to spot! Good crispy fries too.'

author: Adam G.
text: 'I\'ve tried multiple pizza places in Hoboken
column5: including all of the "famous" places that are supposed to be so good. Each time I\'m disappointed compared to the great pizza at Uptown. My family all agrees that this is the best pizza in Hoboken. Favorites include the vodka pie (we get onions and pepperoni with it) and the standard pie (we love the portobello mushrooms
column6: spinach and garlic with it). Food is good as well. I enjoyed the eggplant
column7: eggplant sub and veggie stromboli. Stay away from the garlic bread.'

author: Ryan Hart
text: "Artie Lange was 100% right. It was one of the best pizzas I've ever had in my life."

author: stephen shustock
text: "I used to frequent this shop almost daily! It's amazingly good and has never disappointed ! I would highly recommend the sicilian style!!! I remember when they were newly opened and it was great then and great now!!!"

author: X Boone (The FiG)
text: "Super Tasty
column6: homely hole in the wall. I ordered a  chicken bacon and ranch Sicilian slice; 'twas fluffy
column11: and as visually pleasing as it tastes."

author: Brandi Burgese
text: 'This place is so underrated. Our favorite pizza in hoboken! Yes
column5: better than Napolis! It‚Äôs always consistent. Can‚Äôt comment on any other dishes but the pizza is 10000% amazing!'

author: Marquis Rollins
text: 'I adore this restaurant very much. there is a very special mood. The cuisine is splendid. the service is efficient and the stuff is professional. The cost is modest. profoundly recommend.'

text: "I'm not sure if I was just hungry or it's because this is the first pizza I've had in a while but it was delicious. üòÅ The dough was good. This place deserves more credit."

text: 'Pizza was sitting for sometime place back in the oven had no mozz cheese a couple of slices of rock cheese and sauce slap on it overeally price very dissapointed  and very upset'

text: "I'm from the south side of Chicago and i loved the pizza and the pasta. The food was awsome and prices were reasonable."

author: Katelyn Raspanti
text: 'We just ordered tonight to have it delivered to the Sheraton hotel down the street. Extremely disappointed after we had seen all the positive reviews. Our pizza toppings were incorrect
column6: our garlic knots were like ROCKS
column7: and we got a 2 liter of the wrong soda. It was all edible
column8: but not enjoyable. I feel bad for those in Hoboken who think this place is worth it. Would not recommend.'

author: Oscar
text: 'Really good Sicilian slices'

author: Adrian Douglas
text: 'Never saw this place before. Got some slices the other night and was not disappointed! Dough was on point
column5: not too overcooked. Good size slice too.'

author: Adair Lopez
text: 'Great pizza! The sicilian slices were other worldly! I do recommend this place as a spot to kill hunger!'

text: 'Very good experience for the type of restaurant this is. The waiters are very generous and helpful whenever needed. They also have great pizza and mozzarella sticks!'

text: 'great food

author: Lauren Siev
text: 'Dare I say the best Italian in Hoboken? Their Sicilian

text: 'I love their selection of pizza. Their prices are pretty reasonable. And the greeters and cashier is very helpful and hospitable. They have an outside sitting area which is great'

text: 'Fast

author: Patrick Bateman
text: 'This is by far the best pizza I ever had. Not to exaggerate but
column5: I was never so passionate about a pizza place before
column6: this place is amazing! Sauce is great and has that fresh
column7: homemade taste. The cheese is delicious with pieces of fresh mozzerella spread around. Even the crust is great. I plan on trying every slice. Very satisfied

text: 'Pizza is really awesome. One slice ($3-$4) is enough to fill me up. There are no seats indoors - more of a grab and go place
column5: but they do have seating out on the sidewalk.\n\nTheir other food is okay
column6: but this is a pizzeria so stick with what they do best. If you want a slice of pizza

text: 'Worst pizza in Hoboken My order arrived late and cold. The pizza was below average and the service stinks. Stick with Napolis or Grimaldis. Skip Uptown. TERRIBlE!!!!'

author: what is this .for real
text: 'I was drawn to this place by the delicious aroma emanating from the doors as I drove past. A bit pricey
column5: like everything in Hoboken. But the sauce was delicious. I had a pepperoni slice which at first bite sent my taste buds to heaven but the bland crust soon creeper in and finishing he slice was a bit of a chore.  Again
column7: and I will go back for one of their true Italian dishes when I get time (parking is horrible). Will update review after my next visit. üòÄ'
